Description.Text: Centrally located in the center of Istanbul's modern business district, the Divan Istanbul City has been specifically designed with the needs of the executive traveler in mind and is designed to provide guests with an optimal combination of convenience, comfort and superior facilities. Combining clean, modern style with a functionally elegant approach to accommodations, the Divan Istanbul City offers business and leisure travelers warm, friendly efficient service and outstanding value-for-money. The Divan Istanbul City's ergonomic guestrooms are designed to provide business travelers with the space and facilities they need to be at their best, including not only functional and comfortable work space for those last minute presentation updates but also comfortable furnishings and an extensive pillow menu to ensure guests are well-rested and ready for the big meeting. Featuring a total of 144 rooms including 98 Deluxe Guestrooms, 19 Standard Guestrooms and 27 Junior and Senior Suites, with complimentary hardwired and wireless internet connections in all guestrooms and in all public areas. Hotels provides some other amenities like lobby, reception and Secretarial services and also provides more amenities at charges like airport transfer, baby sitting service, ballroom, doctor on call, dry cleaning, internet access high-speed, internet access - wireless, laundry service, room service and room service - 24 hrs.

Hotel Istanbul city centre hotel provides an outstandingly central location, just 20 minutes to Istanbul Atatrk International Airport with easy access to ring roads, the Bosphorus Bridge leading to the Asian side of Istanbul. It is also located in a major public transit hub, just two-minutes from the metro and dozens of municipal bus routes. The central hotel in Istanbul is also convenient to Istanbul's best shopping at the Cevahir Shopping Center, which is the second largest in Europe, the award-winning Kanyon Shopping Center, featuring the world's top luxury brands, as well as the Profilo and Metrocity shopping centres. Its central location also means that the Divan Istanbul City also offers easy access to the Taksim Square culture and nightlife district as well as the historic sites of the Old City.

Single Room - Single Room offers one double bed with air conditioning , bathrobe - on request, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, CD player (suit rooms), clothes dryer (suit rooms), disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access (extra), iron / ironing board (on request), kettle, kitchenette (suit rooms), laundry service (extra), microwave oven (suit rooms), mini bar (extra), non-smoking rooms, room service (extra), tea and coffee making facilities, telephone, valet service, Pillow Menu, ventilation and central heating and cooling system, in-room safe, IP telephone, Satellite TV and movie channels, complimentary tea and coffee maker and telephone in the bathroom. Room area is 24 m2.
Small Single Room - Small Single Room offers one Queen-size bed with air conditioning , bathrobe - on request, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, cd player (suit rooms), clothes dryer (suit rooms), disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access (extra), iron / ironing board (on request), kettle, kitchenette (suit rooms), laundry service (extra), microwave oven (suit rooms), mini bar (extra), non-smoking rooms, room service (extra), tea and coffee making facilities, telephone, valet service, Pillow Menu, ventilation and central heating and cooling system, in-room safe, IP telephone, Satellite TV and movie channels, complimentary tea and coffee maker and telephone in the bathroom. Room area is 13 m2.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers one King bed or two Twin beds with air conditioning , bathrobe - on request, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, cd player (suit rooms), clothes dryer (suit rooms), disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access (extra), iron / ironing board (on request), kettle, kitchenette (suit rooms), laundry service (extra), microwave oven (suit rooms), mini bar (extra), non-smoking rooms, room service (extra), tea and coffee making facilities, telephone, valet service, Pillow Menu, ventilation and central heating and cooling system, in-room safe, IP telephone, Satellite TV and movie channels, complimentary tea and coffee maker and telephone in the bathroom. Room area is 24 m2 .
Suite Room - Suite Room offers one King bed and two Twin beds with air conditioning , bathrobe - on request, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, CD player (suit rooms), clothes dryer (suit rooms), disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access (extra), iron / ironing board (on request), kettle, kitchenette (suit rooms), laundry service (extra), microwave oven (suit rooms), mini bar (extra), non-smoking rooms, room service (extra), tea and coffee making facilities, telephone, valet service, Pillow Menu, ventilation and central heating and cooling system, in-room safe, IP telephone, Satellite TV and movie channels, complimentary tea and coffee maker, sitting-room and dining-room, trouser press and ironing board and telephone in the bathroom. Room area is 37 m2 .
